Info.Title: Ugly
Info.Writer: Akhilesh Jaiswal (additional writer), Anurag Kashyap, Rohit Pandey (additional writer)
Info.Actors: Rahul Bhat, Ronit Roy, Tejaswini Kolhapure, Viineet Kumar
Info.Plot: The case of a missing girl takes us through a journey of human greed and brushes upon the egos and repressed emotions of the characters.
